section.title: High-lighting Result of Fulltext Search
section.para: It's also called excerption (see Excerpt configuration in Search Configuration and in Searching Repository article).
The goal of this query is to find words "eXo" and "implementation" with fulltext search and high-light this words in result value.

section.title: Base info
